search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Trafft (trafft.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Trafft can be accessed at: [https://trafft.com/pricing/](https://trafft.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Plans and pricing
-----------------

Choose your plan to scale your business with Trafft booking software, or opt for the White Label Agency account to earn from Trafft under your own brand name.

Free plan features:

![Image 1: check](https://trafft.com/static/728189ac805a176cb0c90bbf7870b759/565cd/check-blue.svg)

Unlimited appointments

![Image 2: check](https://trafft.com/static/728189ac805a176cb0c90bbf7870b759/565cd/check-blue.svg)

5 custom features

Booking website

Android and iOS app

Frequently asked questions

Is there a fee/commission per each booking through Trafft?

No, there are no additional commissions or fees, just the monthly or annual payment for the plan if you choose a paid one.

Can I pay for my account annually?

Yes. If you decide to pay for your account annually, you get a discount and a few months of using Trafft for free.

Are there any contracts?

No, there are no contracts. You pay month by month or get an annual subscription.

What if I choose the wrong package?

If you choose a package that’s not suitable for you, you can change it to another one any time.

What if I need a solution with more than 50 users?

For a larger-scale solution, we have our Enterprise plan in which we offer a custom number of users, features and integrations, and premium customer support with a personal account manager. Contact us for more information.

![Image 69: question](https://trafft.com/static/be7c94cb604ebfd39b8667f16b97e238/51f98/faq.webp)

Trafft scheduling tool has subscription plans to suit every budget. Choose the plan that meets your needs, and remember to save on annual billing.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual billing offers discounts and additional free months.

features: Assistance in onboarding, migration and education

promotional_offers.offer_description: Discount and free months for annual billing.
